ISSUE.TITLE: Add a way to add sample data in plugins during a new installation
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Let's add such a feature. Next we should think about which of our plugins we need to add sample data to.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #7379 Added a way to use a new order GUID when setting payment request

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7685 Add a way to add sample data in plugins during a new installation
